main event: On July 7, 1948, three unconventional aircraft were reported over Chapel Hill, North Carolina, producing a sound phenomenon but no objects were visibly seen.
interesting points: Witnesses reported a 'jet' sound associated with the event, The event lasted approximately one minute, The aircraft were flying at high altitude and high speed, The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting, The report mentions the possibility of natural aircraft rather than UFOs.
witness description: A Captain in the Infantry Reserves and a mathematics instructor at the University of North Carolina.
